body:
Hello, so since I'm banned on Avicus and I've been asked by a few people about my "Continents At War" Tournament I'm gonna be scratching that idea for now, until I get appeal etc..

How Will This Work?

It will work like Nova's unofficial Tournament. 8 teams, 8 matches, Bo3.

Which Server Will This Be On?

The Tournament will happen on Qrysis's Practice Server (Ocn Scrim Server Now).

IP: (Will be posted here if staff allow it)
TS IP: (Will be posted here if staff allow it)

Dates and Time?

Dates, March 5th and 6th

Times. will be based on which teams participate due to there timezones


Prizes?

Still N/A since credits are not an option seeing I'm banned.

Team Applications, and Team Size?

Team Applications: Send me a message Via skype. (only leaders)

Team Sizes: Minimum: 8 Maximum: 10 (any of your team members can join but only 8-10 can play)

replies.body:
Yes, I don't know how to delete a post. 

I posted a peom peom for you on your banner thread but accidentally put it here at first. So I replaced the poem with "sigh" and put the poem on your thread. Enjoy

replies.body: Wait, can you apply to be a leader of a team?

replies.body: No, you would have to be on a team to play. Ex: Cronus, Cacal, or Apollo.
